alert.note: Alert for Okanogan Highlands; Okanogan Valley; Upper Columbia Basin; Waterville Plateau; Wenatchee Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 09 at 11:44AM PST until December 10 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations up to 5 inches and ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Bridgeport, Coulee City, Okanogan, Republic, Pangborn Airport, Wenatchee, Cashmere, Odessa, Brewster, Creston, Wilbur, Harrington, Sherman Pass, Wauconda, Inchelium, Number 2 Canyon, Waterville, Grand Coulee, Nespelem, Omak, Disautel Pass, Ritzville, Chesaw Road, Boulder Creek Road, Number 1 Canyon, Tonasket, Oroville, Badger Mountain Road, Chelan, Entiat, Highway 20 Wauconda Summit, and Mansfield. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel

area.areaDesc: Okanogan Highlands; Okanogan Valley; Upper Columbia Basin; Waterville Plateau; Wenatchee Area
